name: Else If();
description:
Else If(); is a RPG stealth video game that teaches programming while you play.

Welcome to Mid-Ridge City in the year 2133, a type of artificial intelligence called the Jinzo has gained sentience and currently live at peace with humanity after a war several years earlier, but tension is growing could someone gain from another war? You play as Agent Williams of the Mobius Core, a disgraced special agent who aims to clear their name after a failed mission two years prior. You get paired up with an AI hound called Alpha and work together to discover and explore and find out who is actually trying to start the war, and stop it before it begins.
